009package Ch07_Morphological_Filters;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
017import imagingbook.common.morphology.BinaryDilation;
018import imagingbook.common.morphology.BinaryMorphologyFilter;
019import imagingbook.common.morphology.StructuringElements;
020import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
021
022import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
023
024/**
025 * <p>
026 * ImageJ plugin implementing a binary dilation by a disk-shaped structuring element with a fixed radius. See Sec. 7.2
027 * of [1] for additional details. This plugin works on 8-bit grayscale images only, the original image is modified.
028 * Zero-value pixels are considered background, all other pixels are foreground. Different to ImageJ's built-in
029 * morphological operators, this implementation does not incorporate the current display lookup-table (LUT).
030 * </p>
031 * <p>
032 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
033 * (2022).
034 * </p>
035 *
036 * @author WB
037 * @version 2022/12/07
038 */
039public class Dilate_Disk_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
040
041        private static double Radius = 6.5;
042
043        private ImagePlus im;
044
045        /** Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open. */
046        public Dilate_Disk_Demo() {
047                if (noCurrentImage()) {
048                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.RhinoSmallInv);
049                }
050        }
051        
052        @Override
053        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
054                this.im = im;
055                return DOES_8G;
056        }
057
058        @Override
059        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
060                if (!runDialog()) {
061                        return;
062                }
063
064                byte[][] H = StructuringElements.makeDiskKernel(Radius);
065                BinaryMorphologyFilter filter = new BinaryDilation(H);
066                filter.applyTo((ByteProcessor) ip);
067        }
068
069        private boolean runDialog() {
070                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
071                if (im.isInvertedLut()) {
072                        gd.setInsets(0, 0, 0);
073                        gd.addMessage("NOTE: Image has inverted LUT (0 = white)!");
074                }
075                gd.addNumericField("Radius (filters only)", Radius, 1, 5, "pixels");
076
077                gd.showDialog();
078                if (gd.wasCanceled())
079                        return false;
080
081                Radius = gd.getNextNumber();
082                return true;
083        }
084}
